TopicTitle: What is the avatar of the person above you saying/thinking?

Articles.Content: What was that?

Dragon things!

"Must defend eggs."
What's your avatar, General Rarity?
"Mom, I'm stuck in this mud and someone is taking a picture of me!"
"Screw KSP, I'm going to go break stuff with this metal arm."

Grox pony has come to save the day!

Grox pony has come to save the day!

Grox pony has come to save the day!

Grox pony has come to save the day!

Daduhla!, dudalundanda!

Grox pony has come to save the day!

Grox pony has come to save the day!

Grox pony has come to save the day!

Grox pony has come to save the day!

Daduhla!, dudalundanda!

DAMMIT I WAS NINJA'D
"I can't tell what pokemon I am!"
" Oh sweet mud... I love you so much... So wet and muddy... "

RELEASE THE KRAKEN!

caps

"Sh.... Not again, its the sixth time i get stuck in mud on this SINGLE day!"

I should change my profile pic anytime soon, the "kerbin sunrise" thing is getting old

It was from my third docking, i made both capsules re-enter attached, and then separated them and landed them 500m away from each other. Took a kerbal near the other capsule, EVAd the guy on that capsule and got the pic...

" Here comes the sun,

(doo doo doo)

here comes the sun,

And I say it's all right. "
Release the kraken!
Screw the dang keys, somebody get me out of this quicksand!!! >:-[

*Fssssshhhhhhhhhhhhh* *Tiiip* "Uhh Houston, we've been burning for like 2 days, are we there yet?" *Tiip*........ *Tiip* "Here Houston, no, you need to burn for 5 more days" *Tiip* *Fssssssssssshhhhhhhhhhhhh*

Nice inspiration the Apollo 11 landing gives

In the same vein as our Kraken-in-training....

"Sundown you better take care,

If I find you been creepin' 'round my back stairs"

*Whoosh

Ahhhh!!!
No avatar detected.
"I hate mud."
Bwaaaawwwwwh clack-clack-clack-clack-clack-clack.....
*insert dragon noise*

*insert noise*

that's boring.

*splat squish squish*

that seems better.

Clop clop cling clop clop clop cling clop clop clop cling clop clop

lol :^3
" Are we there yet "
Release the kraken
Bury the kraken in mud and trample on it!
